channel.title: Can someone give me a rundown on the history of RSPS?
channel.description:
I've always been interested on the past of the development of different clients. Also can someone tell me the different Client versions and what's special about each one of them? Saw a list but I think it was incomplete.
And finally, has someone developed a fully functional 317 or <508 yet? I would enjoy playing in an environment where it wasn't full of customs / fake mechanics. Basically a 317 with real physics. I know they have good working RSC PS but I've yet to see one for RS2.
Also is there anything earlier than 317 / can I play it? And are there any old RSC PS?
Lots of questions I know but it's a Saturday and I feel like researching / having a nostalgia moment.

item.title: Can someone give me a rundown on the history of RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:10, topic:345939”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=442318.msg3248460#msg3248460 date=1277567588]

It started good, Delta made it sucks, then 508s came out with all there bugs and problems, somewhat fixed them, kept moving on not really knowing how to, and now we are here. MAGIC

Delta didn’t make it suck; allstar did. Absolutely full of crap. Completely ruined Runescape.
[/quote]every server sucks dick, no server is the “best” because NO server will ever be as stable and full as runescape.[/quote]Unless we do this.

2n6gp76.png1109×907

since his replacing the source with delta we just need delta and its stable as runescape (Delta).

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me a rundown on the history of RSPS?
